source: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_SEQ_00<tab>Laxio of Little Solace remains unconvinced of your intentions.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_SEQ_00<tab>シルフの仮宿のラキシオは、冒険者をまだ認めていないようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_SEQ_01<tab>Laxio demands that you obey his every command as proof that you are a friend to the sylphs. First, /poke his back to scratch an itch.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_SEQ_01<tab>ラキシオのご機嫌をとるため、エモート「つつく」をしよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_SEQ_02<tab>By touching Laxio, you have been afflicted with a sylphic curse that turns one's skin to moss. /examineself and ascertain its dire effect.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_SEQ_02<tab>魔法をかけられてしまったらしい、エモート「自分を見る」をしよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_SEQ_03<tab>The curse was a lie; Laxio was only fooling you. Express your adulation and /congratulate him on his brilliant ruse.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_SEQ_03<tab>ラキシオのご機嫌をとるため、エモート「称賛する」をしよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_SEQ_04<tab>Your sense of humor pleases Laxio, who now welcomes you to Little Solace with wings outspread.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_SEQ_04<tab>ラキシオはご機嫌だ。冒険者はラキシオにもやっと認められたようだ。
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_TODO_01<tab>ラキシオをターゲットして「自分を見る」をする
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_TODO_02<tab>ラキシオに「称賛する」をする

source: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_000<tab>Walking one may dance many dances, but this one still doesn't like walking ones! Why? Because walking ones don't listen! That's why!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_000うちらに挨拶して回ってるのはお前ふっち？
けっこう踊りが上手だけど、それくらいじゃ
アタピは仲良くしてあげないふっち。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_001<tab>If walking one wants to be friend to this one, walking one should listen, and listen good! This one has itchy spot on back. Walking one should <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>poke<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> it.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_001仲良くちたいなら、アタピの言うこときくふっち！
まずは背中がかゆいから掻いてほしいでふっち。
ちょっと「つつく」くらいで丁度いいふっち。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_010<tab>This one has itchy spot on back. Walking one should <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>poke<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> it. And not too hard! This one has sensitive fibers.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_010早く背中を「つつく」ふっち。
優しくちないと怒るでふっち。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_015<tab>Tee hee! Walking one fell into trap! Touching this one turns walking ones' skin into moss!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_015ひっかかったでふっち！
アタピに触ったお前には、
姿が緑になる魔法をかけたふっち！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_016<tab>Tee hee! Mossy one's skin turns greener and greener! Mossy one should <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>examine self<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to see how silly mossy one has become!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_016よーく「自分を見る」でふっち。
緑のマヌケな姿になってるでふっち。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_020<tab>Do walking one's ears not hear? This one said walking one should <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>poke<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> this one's back!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_020そうじゃないふっち！
ちゃんと「つつく」のでふっち。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_030<tab>Tee hee! Mossy one's skin turns greener and greener! Mossy one should <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>examine self<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_030緑の魔法は、よくきいてるでふっち。
よく「自分を見る」でふっち。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_035<tab>Hee hee hee! Walking one is so silly! There is no curse, silly one!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_035あははは、騙されたふっち。
緑の魔法はウソふっち！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_036<tab>This one tricked silly one good, yes? This one is smart. Silly one should <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>congratulate<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> this one for being so very smart.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_036アタピは、かなりウソがうまいでふっち？
「称賛する」といいふっちよ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_040<tab>Does walking one's brain turn to moss, too? This one said mossy one should <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>examine self<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. What is mossy one waiting for?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_040あはははは、そんなことしてもダメふっち。
それじゃ「自分を見る」ことは、できないふっち。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_050<tab>This one is smart. Silly one should <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>congratulate<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> this one for being so very smart.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_050すごいでふっち？
アタピを「称賛する」でふっち。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_055<tab>That's right, silly one! This one is very, very smart one. Silly one is smart to know this.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_055そうでふっち。
アタピはすごいのでふっち。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_056<tab>Silly one makes this one laugh. This one likes to laugh. Maybe silly one is not so bad, after all.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_056お前はおもちろいのでふっち。
しょうがないから仲良くちてやるでふっち！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_060<tab>Silly one is no fun! This one tricked silly one. Silly one should <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>congratulate<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> this one for being so very smart.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA106_00720_LAXIO_000_060そんなのおもちろくないふっち！
アタピを「称賛する」のでふっち。
